channel.title: v1.3.1 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases
channel.description: Recent content in v1.3.1 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases

item.title: Test transient error in engine status during eviction
item.description: Test step Create and attach a multi-replica volume. Prepare one extra disk for a node that contains at least one volume replica. Keep monitoring the engine YAML. e.g., watch -n "kubectl -n longhorn-system get lhe <engine name>". Evicting the old disk for node. => Verify that there is no transient error in engine Status during eviction. A counter example is like: apiVersion: longhorn.io/v1beta2 kind: Engine metadata: creationTimestamp: "2022-07-27T04:46:03Z" finalizers: - longhorn.
